# Python 数据分析与挖掘实战 带注释源码

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/python-shujufenxi-yu-wajue-shizhan-dai-zhushi-yuanma
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/python-shujufenxi-yu-wajue-shizhan-dai-zhushi-yuanma
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install python-shujufenxi-yu-wajue-shizhan-dai-zhushi-yuanma
python-shujufenxi-yu-wajue-shizhan-dai-zhushi-yuanma <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g python-shujufenxi-yu-wajue-shizhan-dai-zhushi-yuanma
python-shujufenxi-yu-wajue-shizhan-dai-zhushi-yuanma <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
